title: Inner Peace
description: Peace… Does it exist? Tezzi and Kea aren’t really sure, but now that they have found their way back to each other, nothing will stop them. Kea has vowed that Tezzi is hers, and Tezzi has accepted the world of the trolls. Together, they are desperately searching… Searching for sanctuary, searching for home, searching for the elusive inner peace they are desperate for.'
author: Amanda Kay
